itemDescription: Recipient of the Distinguished Flying Cross

wikipedia_page.main: Leonard Edmund Henry Williams,  (6 December 1919 – 9 June 2007) was the former chief of the Nationwide building society, also known for his career as a Spitfire pilot in the Royal Air Force during the Second World War.

response: ** Leonard E. H. Williams, World War II Spitfire pilot and businessman (born 1919)
** Leonard E. H. Williams, pilot and businessman (died 2007)
*Leonard E. H. Williams, 87, British World War II Spitfire pilot and businessman.
* Leonard E. H. Williams CBE DFC, Chief Executive from 1967 to 1981 of the Nationwide Building Society
* Leonard E. H. Williams (1919–2007), former head of the Nationwide Building Society and Spitfire pilot
